pages.text: $(mod)QuarryPlus$() adds the $(item)Quarry Plus$(), which digs a big ol hole in the ground and gives you what it mined.$(br2)The $(o)Plus$() means you can upgrade and enchant the Quarry.
$(br2)$(br2)$(br2)See more at its main page page here: $(l:patchouli:mod_content/tech/quarryplus)QuarryPlus$().
